segments.text: I notice the entire kitchen setup from this angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's at the sink, apron on, drying dishes methodically.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh, the faucet's pouring water that's not draining.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's overflowing steadily, soaking the lower cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her stance is relaxed, foot in the growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacked bowls wait on the counter, innocent bystanders.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window overlooks a lovely garden path with plants.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, though, the boy's risking it all on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tipping back as he dives into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He balances a plate too, like a pro thief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaches up, eyes wide with excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking rules right under the woman's nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could be a funny story later, if no one gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm exterior view makes the interior frenzy stand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a mix of worry and amusement watching this.
segments.speaker: PAR
